fixes.name: Measure Selector
fixes.dax_expression: SWITCH(SELECTEDVALUE('Measure Selector Param'[Display As]), "Profit", SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore'[Profit]), "Sales", SUM('Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales]))
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the Tableau parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Measure Selector Param'[Display As]) and mapped field references to 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit] and 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[Sales]. Wrapped the fields with SUM to produce an aggregated measure that responds to filter context, matching the intended parameter-driven selection behavior.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter; all parameter-based calculations must be measures.
